subtitle: chapter five

so that you will perceive that my twin

this was all the importance that was

save one thing that i shall mention

so could i still merge with her

having made clear these things my

being of green smooth surface when

these two sculptures were not at that

chapter 6
my children now that i have described
unto you the various chambers which
comprise my father's great house of
initiation
and now that i have told you that
concerning the placing of the various
important pieces of furniture
and those vessels used in the sacred
feast of remembrance
i would make quite clear unto you a most
important question which will be upon
the lips of many of you
you will say yes rather a beautiful
place but how does this help us
and what have we to do with the ancient
rites of initiation as practiced in
ancient camus
i say unto you that your question is
quite merited and for that reason i
shall answer it here my book of truth
unto you my children
do not forget that the world called
earth has been in existence and has
nourished conscious life for much longer
than any incarnate spirit who is not a
reincarnated initiated depth can
possibly tell you
the process of man's downward path
towards materiality has been very
gradual and very steady
the communicating link between the men
of earth and the divine teachers was not
severed in a moment
nay you will remember from part one of
this my book of truth unto you that even
after the destruction of lemuria the
divine teachers and even the first sons

atlantis and did strive to show them the
ways of truth
in fact man was in direct communication

yet did this not suffice
and the yahavik men of earth the divine

when that son of god was viceroy for
earth
leaned into the ways of sataku
and gradually became steeped in

then came the great flood of atlantis

saying stretch out thine hand and

yet shalt thou allow certain of the men

and thou shalt place a leader over each

and each leader shall construct him
large boats that can float upon the
surface of the floods
the flood mentioned in the bible genesis

atlantis
and these boats shall be guided
according to my will
that they may come to rest upon dry land
at what whatsoever place i shall choose
so was it my children that god the

alas my children the men of earth and

cause the mentalities of the various

and cause each group to depart in its

coming destruction
and bid then disembark at that spot

also command each leader of each group

and bid him collect one male and one

and bid him take them into the boat and

and when all has been collected as i

bid all to embark taking with him food

thus spake the godhead unto my father so

some picked few of these again being

think not that my warnings unto you are
